body_html:
Just for the sake of completeness regarding the command:
You're supposed to change /path/to/cuda/lib to the path on your machine which should be something like /usr/include/cuda/ or /opt/cuda-7.5/ or /home/username/Downloads/cuda/.
If everything is working now, you could close the issue.
body_text:
Just for the sake of completeness regarding the command:
You're supposed to change /path/to/cuda/lib to the path on your machine which should be something like /usr/include/cuda/ or  /opt/cuda-7.5/ or /home/username/Downloads/cuda/.
If everything is working now, you could close the issue.
body:
Just for the sake of completeness regarding the command:
You're supposed to change `/path/to/cuda/lib` to the path on your machine which should be something like `/usr/include/cuda/` or  `/opt/cuda-7.5/` or `/home/username/Downloads/cuda/`.
If everything is working now, you could close the issue.
